CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( /** OR(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c, "Request"), ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c, "Not Submitted"), ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c, "In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c, "In Signatures")), **/ /** OR( ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c , 'Approved') , ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c , "Not Submitted"), ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c , 'None') ), **/ NOT(APT_Is_Create_Contract_Batch_Job_Running__c), APT_Ratecards_Created__c, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c, "Terminated"))), HYPERLINK("apex/APT_CreateContractValidation?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create_Green", "Create Contract Documents (One Click)"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Create Contracts
